body_html: This PR exposes the internal implementations within the cuda/include/crt directory. These files are subject to frequent changes between CUDA versions, and are not intended for direct inclusion. A better solution would be to update the Eigen sources to hash 034b6c3 or newer, which substitutes the 'public' cuda_runtime.h header for math_functions.hpp.

These files are subject to frequent changes between CUDA versions, and are not intended for direct inclusion. A better solution would be to update the Eigen sources to hash 034b6c3 or newer, which substitutes the 'public' cuda_runtime.h header for math_functions.hpp.
body: This PR exposes the internal implementations within the cuda/include/crt directory. These files are subject to frequent changes between CUDA versions, and are not intended for direct inclusion. A better solution would be to update the Eigen sources to hash 034b6c3 or newer, which substitutes the 'public' cuda_runtime.h header for math_functions.hpp.
